text: chaw xahrab chnbth thi helux xyu nı meuxng ca klaw kæ cea wa thraphysin khxng rea læa khrxbkhraw khxng rea thahı rea mi thura yung xyu dangnan di pord khxxphay hı kæ rea dwy phwk khea klaw dwy lin khxng phwk khea doy mimi xari nı hawcı khxng phwk khea cng klaw theid muhammad khır lea ca mi xanac xan dı thi ca pxngkan phwk cea ca kxallxhˌ hak phraxngkh thrng prasngkh hı khwam thukkh kæ phwk cea hrux phraxngkh thrng prasngkh ca hı prayochn kæ phwk cea tæwa xallxhˌ thrng trahnak ying nı sing thi phwk cea kratha
